about_the_game:
MultiGames is a round-based Multiplayer/LAN party minigames game with different game modes and many weapons and props. you can also change your look to make your style shine. Host private matches to beat your friends in fun game modes or matchmake worldwide to test your skill.

Gameplay
You play a round-based PVP game where your goal is to beat others or survive the longest. Decide if you should win by competing in a tournament style or the most amount of wins.

Custom Maps
What separates this game from other round-based PVP games is that you can play community-made maps to either maximize the amount of skill or the amount of fun.

MultiGames is made for people to have fun beating others so if you're wondering what to play with your friends this is the game to choose

name: MultiGames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad
